synopsis.text: Akari Oozora, the newly crowned Starlight Queen, and her fellow idols embark on an exciting cinematic journey in this short anime, which was screened alongside the Aikatsu Stars! Movie, marking the franchise's first-ever double feature. Directed by the talented Ichigo Hoshimiya, this slapstick adventure follows the 25 idols as they navigate through a series of hilarious and heartwarming events in search of the elusive Aikatsu! Card, a magical card with the power to grant any wish. Join the idols on their quest for the ultimate prize and witness their unforgettable final stage performance in this unique and entertaining anime experience.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
